dict.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sql_structure_vertion ( id TEXT NOT NULL,version TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(id));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS FileRecord (url TEXT ,md5 TEXT ,fileType integerL, second datetime default "",createTime TIMESTAMP default (datetime('now', 'localtime')), localPath TEXT);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Test ( id TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(id));
ALTER TABLE FileRecord ADD uploadStatus INTEGER
